name: WordPress Additional Order Filters for WooCommerce plugin跨站请求伪造漏洞
product: ["WordPress Additional Order Filters for WooCommerce plugin <=1.22"]
description: WordPress和WordPress plugin都是WordPress基金会的产品。WordPress plugin是一个应用插件。WordPress Additional Order Filters for WooCommerce plugin存在跨站请求伪造漏洞，该漏洞源于WEB应用未充分验证请求是否来自可信用户。目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://wordpress.org/plugins/additional-order-filters-for-woocommerce/
patch: WordPress Additional Order Filters for WooCommerce plugin跨站请求伪造漏洞的补丁
